ModMetaData.name: [B18] Thanks For All The Fish
ModMetaData.author: Pyrce
ModMetaData.description:
[B18] Basic Fishing mod
A nice description here (maybe with some sarcastic note about how everything causes lag).
Basic functionality in place. Setup a Fishing Spot from the Production Tab, add a Catch Fish bill, make sure Animal Handling skills are active. Pawns should now fish for you.
Fishing is sped up by Animal Handling skill, but it provides no skill-ups.
WARNING: NOT balance tested yet - is fishing speed too fast/slow? -- with 0 skill -- with 10 skill -- with 20 skill - do yields make sense? - does fish rot too slow/fast when not refrigerated? -- meant to be a fast rot food; adds risk of heat waves/solar flares wiping it out when other foods would last - is that fishing reel sound too loud?
TODOs: - get a better fish graphic - change the fishing spot graphic - add language translations
